content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Lab at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 10.5, 10.5) connected to a small electric pole (position 13.5, 10.5) for power.

### Small Electric Poles
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole (position 13.5, 10.5) providing power to the lab.
- Small electric pole (position 16.5, 10.5) providing additional power.
- Small electric pole (position 20.5, 10.5) providing additional power.
- Small electric pole (position 6.5, 0.5) providing additional power.

### Furnaces
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) - Status: WORKING, Fuel: {'coal': 11}
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: {'coal': 8}
- Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: {'coal': 20}

### Wooden Chest at position (5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position 5.5, 0.5) containing {'iron-plate': 200}.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing small electric poles
- Ensure there is no existing object in the way before attempting to place a small electric pole. Check the area for obstructions.

### Errors when searching for power sources
- Ensure that power sources like solar panels or steam engines are placed on the map before attempting to connect to them. If none are available, consider placing them first.

### Errors when inventory is empty
- Always check your inventory before attempting to place entities. Ensure you have the required items available to avoid errors related to missing entities.
